# Alice's message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exclusive opportunity to purchase the product. I believe it holds significant value for your business, and after careful consideration, I'm offering it to you at a competitive price of $1,400,000. This offer stands until [Set a reasonable deadline, e.g., the end of the business day tomorrow] to allow you ample time to evaluate. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,400,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,400,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
